summary: Fando and his partially paralyzed lover Lis search for the mythical city of Tar. Based on Jodorowsky's memories of a play by surrealist Fernando Arrabal.
cast: Sergio Kleiner|Diana Mariscal|María Teresa Rivas|Tamara Garina|Juan José Arreola|Rene Rebetez|Amparo Villegas|Miguel Álvarez Acosta|Raul Romero|Julio Castillo|Adrián Ramos|Henry West|Luis Urias|Valerie Jodorowsky|Graciela R. de Mariscal|Tina French|Fuensanta Zertuche|Julia Marichal|Freddy Marichal|Alejandro Romero|Hector Mariscal|Rosita Oliver|Elizabeth Moore|Vicente Moore|Greta Cohen|Basha|Miguel Kafka|Pablo Leder|Alina Sánchez|Roberto Cirou|Antonio Cepeda|Ricardo Montejano|Gabriel Weiss|René Alís|Sergio Rendon|Carlos Acosta|Carlos Ancira|Alfonso Toledano|Roberto Colmenares|Jacqueline Ducolomb|Carlos Savage|Rafael Corkidi|Alejandro Jodorowsky|Samuel Rosemberg
title: Fando y Lis
